!title: Lemon & Poppyseed Madeleines
!size: 12 pieces
!author: Andreas Wallner
!source: Gordon Ramsay via Youtube
!lang: en

* 3 eggs
* 80g caster sugar
- whisk until airy

* 80g flour
- sift in and mix

* zest 1/2 lemon
* 1tbsp poppyseed
* 75g butter, molten and cooled
- mix in

* butter
* flour
- butter and flour the molds
- pour dough into the molds
- bake in preheated oven at 170°C for 10—12 minutes
